name: Lrrl or Rllr
summary: LRRL or RLLR is a puzzle game in which you enjoy increasing your score by choosing left or right according to one recursive rule. You can enjoy it as long as you don't make the wrong choice. All choices are divided to the left or right when you start, and either contains all of your later choices.

name: L-Racers
summary: L-Racers is a minimalistic, retro, 1980s arcade-style old school game where you go head-to-head against another player (CPU or human) and be the last racer alive.

name: L/Right Reflection
summary: "L/Right Reflection" is an RPG game in which the player fights by reflecting enemy attacks. Choose the appropriate magic for each situation, detect the enemy attacks, and face a variety of enemies.

name: L-Room
summary: Let's build the routes that connect the platforms. This is a first-person puzzle game where you have to understand the algorithm and select the correct nodes.Think carefully with a drone as a companion.

name: LR2oraja
summary: LR2oraja is BMS-player forked from beatoraja, but using Luniatic Rave 2 timing windows and gauges instead of the default beatoraja ones.
